entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 7:39 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 7:39 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
